title: Maximum Profit in Job Scheduling
content:
We have  jobs, where every job is scheduled to be done from  to , obtaining a profit of .
You're given the  ,  and  arrays, you need to output the maximum profit you can take such that there are no 2 jobs in the subset with overlapping time range.
If you choose a job that ends at time  you will be able to start another job that starts at time .
